com.safety4kids.game.Entities

Class Hazard

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion
      • com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite
        • com.safety4kids.game.Entities.Hazard
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HazardSprite

    public abstract class Hazard
extends com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite
    This Class represents the base hazard within the game. It is skeleton for all hazards providing its basic abstraction.

    Course Info:

    Author:
    Erfan Yeganehfar, Bill Bai Ms. Krasteva Modifications: 4.0 finished the class. Finised the constructor, abstract methods, and instance vars
